languages.text: "Вы спасли меня от службы, что была во сто крат хуже самой лютой смерти, и я в долгу перед Вашей Светлостью. Если для его оплаты мне потребуется положить свою жизнь — так тому и быть".

traits.locale_text: "Я в долгу перед вами, {name} фон Валанциус. Если для его оплаты мне потребуется положить свою жизнь — так тому и быть".

languages.text: "You saved me from a life of service that would have been a hundred times worse than the cruellest of deaths, and I am indebted to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I have to lay down my life to repay that debt, then so be it."
languages.original_text: "Вы спасли меня от службы, что была во сто крат хуже самой лютой смерти, и я в долгу перед Вашей Светлостью. Если для его оплаты мне потребуется положить свою жизнь — так тому и быть".

traits.locale_text: "You saved me from a life of service that would've been a hundred times worse than the cruellest of deaths, and I am indebted to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I have to lay down my life to repay that debt, then so be it."

"You saved me from a life of service that would've been a hundred times worse than the cruellest of deaths, and I am indebted to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I have to lay down my life to repay that debt, then so be it."

"You saved me from a life of service that would've been a hundred times worse than the cruellest of deaths, and I am indebted to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I have to lay down my life to repay that debt, then so be it."

"You saved me from a life of service that would have been a hundred times worse than the cruellest of deaths, and I am indebted to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I have to lay down my life to repay that debt, then so be it."

languages.text: «Me ha salvado de una vida de servicio que habría sido cien veces peor que la más cruel de las muertes, y por ello estoy en deuda con mi{mf|lord|lady}. Si tengo que dar mi vida para pagarla, que así sea».
languages.original_text: "You saved me from a life of service that would have been a hundred times worse than the cruellest of deaths, and I am indebted to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I have to lay down my life to repay that debt, then so be it."

traits.locale_text: «Me ha salvado de una vida de servicio que habría sido cien veces peor que la más cruel de las muertes, y por ello estoy en deuda con mi{mf|lord|lady}. Si tengo que dar mi vida para pagarla, que así sea».

languages.text: 「あなたは、一番残酷な死に方より、100倍ひどい仕事をする生活から救ってくださった。陛下には恩ができたな。この恩に報いるために命を捨てる状況になれば、そうしよう」
languages.original_text: "You saved me from a life of service that would have been a hundred times worse than the cruellest of deaths, and I am indebted to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I have to lay down my life to repay that debt, then so be it."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは、一番残酷な死に方より、100倍ひどい仕事をする生活から救ってくださった。陛下には恩ができたな。この恩に報いるために命を捨てる状況になれば、そうしよう」

languages.text: “您把我从恐怖的处境中解救了出来，那样的处境可能会带来比最残忍的死亡还要悲惨百倍的命运。我对您充满了感激，大人。如果我必须牺牲自己的生命，才能偿还这样的恩情，那我愿意献身。”
languages.original_text: "You saved me from a life of service that would have been a hundred times worse than the cruellest of deaths, and I am indebted to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I have to lay down my life to repay that debt, then so be it."

traits.locale_text: “您把我从恐怖的处境中解救了出来，那样的处境可能会带来比最残忍的死亡还要悲惨百倍的命运。我对您充满了感激，大人。如果我必须牺牲自己的生命，才能偿还这样的恩情，那我愿意献身。”

languages.text: "Ihr habt mich vor einem Dienst bewahrt, der einhundert Mal schlimmer gewesen wäre als der grausamste aller Tode, und ich stehe in Eurer Schuld, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wenn ich mein Leben geben muss, um diese Schuld zu begleichen, dann tue ich das bereitwillig."
languages.original_text: "You saved me from a life of service that would have been a hundred times worse than the cruellest of deaths, and I am indebted to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I have to lay down my life to repay that debt, then so be it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mich vor einem Dienst bewahrt, der einhundert Mal schlimmer gewesen wäre als der grausamste aller Tode, und ich stehe in Eurer Schuld, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wenn ich mein Leben geben muss, um diese Schuld zu begleichen, dann tue ich das bereitwillig."

languages.text: « Vous m'avez épargné une vie de servitude cent fois pire que la mort la plus cruelle, et j'ai une immense dette envers vous, Votre Seigneurie. Si je dois donner ma vie pour m'en acquitter, je le ferai sans hésiter. »
languages.original_text: "You saved me from a life of service that would have been a hundred times worse than the cruellest of deaths, and I am indebted to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I have to lay down my life to repay that debt, then so be it."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'avez épargné une vie de servitude cent fois pire que la mort la plus cruelle, et j'ai une immense dette envers vous, Votre Seigneurie. Si je dois donner ma vie pour m'en acquitter, je le ferai sans hésiter. »

languages.text: "Beni, en gaddar ölümlerden bile yüzlerce kez daha kötü bir hizmetle geçirdiğim o hayattan kurtardınız. Size borçluyum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu borcu ödemek için canımı ortaya koymam gerekiyorsa öyle olsun."
languages.original_text: "You saved me from a life of service that would have been a hundred times worse than the cruellest of deaths, and I am indebted to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If I have to lay down my life to repay that debt, then so be it."
